Contributor Guide

We welcome contributions to the CKD prediction project! Please follow these guidelines:

  1. Fork and Clone the Repository:

    Start by forking the repository and then cloning it locally.

  2. Create a New Branch:

    Create a new branch for your changes. This helps to keep work separated and makes it easy to integrate your changes later.

  3. Make Changes:

    Make your changes in your new branch. Please follow the code style used throughout the project.

  4. Test Your Changes:

    Make sure your changes do not break any existing functionality and that any new features are thoroughly tested.

  5. Submit a Pull Request:

    Once your changes are ready and tested, push them to your fork and submit a pull request. Be sure to clearly describe the changes you’ve made in the pull request description.

Thanks for considering contributing to the CKD prediction project!
